      • Initialize

        public void Initialize(int xCoordinate,
              int yCoordinate)
        Initialize enemy helicopter.
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - Starting x coordinate of helicopter.
        yCoordinate - Starting y coordinate of helicopter.
        helicopterBodyImg - Image of helicopter body.
        helicopterFrontPropellerAnimImg - Image of front helicopter propeller.
        helicopterRearPropellerAnimImg - Image of rear helicopter propeller.

      • restartEnemy

        public static void restartEnemy()
        It sets speed and time between enemies to the initial properties.

      • speedUp

        public static void speedUp()
        It increase enemy speed and decrease time between new enemies.

      • isLeftScreen

        public boolean isLeftScreen()
        Checks if the enemy is left the screen.
        Returns:
        true if the enemy is left the screen, false otherwise.
